post.summary: Upload single image, and return Url.

File.description: Accepted Image Types: 1- Jpeg, 2- Png, 3- Jpg

Type.description:
Possible Values: 0 = Banner, 1 = Product, 2 = Category, 3 = DesignerLogo, 4 = DesignerBackground, 5 = ModelImage, 
6 = ModelPortfolio, 7 = PhotographerImage, 8 = PhotographerPortfolio

code.description: Possible values: SAR, KWD, AUD, BHD, OMR

bearerAuth.description: JWT Authorization header using the Bearer scheme. Example: "Authorization: Bearer {token}"
bearerAuth.name: Authorization
